description:
The quarterfinal match against Generation of Miracles member Murasakibara and Kagami`s friend from America Himuro`s team Yosen High finally begins!
Seirin take on the undefeated and impregnable "Shield of Aegis" Yosen defense with their fast passing and Kiyoshi`s Vice Claw, but fail to score any points by the end of the first quarter.
Source: crunchyroll
